text: Miguel Ángel Estrella (4 July 1940 – 7 April 2022), was an Argentine pianist and human rights activist. He was a UNESCO Goodwill Ambassador and a juror of the Russell Tribunal. He was born in San Miguel de Tucumán, Argentina. He went into exile on 1976 during the National Reorganization Process and was imprisoned and tortured in 1977 by the Civic-military dictatorship of Uruguay. He was released in 1980.Miguel Angel Estrella homenajea en París a su “ángel liberador” From 2007 to 2016 he was the Argentine ambassador to the UNESCO. In 2013 he was honoured by the Argentine Senate for his career and his human rights defense.Miguel Ángel Estrella recibió la distinción de honor del Senado Estrella died on 7 April 2022 in Paris, France at the age of 81.Murió en Francia el gran pianista argentino Miguel Ángel Estrella, exembajador en la Unesco ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Argentine musicians Category:Pianists Category:Argentine human rights activists
title: Miguel Ángel Estrella
